content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL datalakegen2
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
    SECRET = 'sp=racwdlmeop&st=2024-04-19T08:56:19Z&se=2024-05-03T16:56:19Z&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=c&sig=x0jclbfS3va8742%2BN2cDt4BCodPheJexQMDe5MSw6bg%3D';
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = '0419_testsynapse12_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [0419_testsynapse12_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://0419@testsynapse12.dfs.core.windows.net',
		CREDENTIAL = datalakegen2
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tableB (
	[FL_DATE] date,
	[DEP_DELAY] smallint,
	[ARR_DELAY] smallint,
	[AIR_TIME] smallint,
	[DISTANCE] smallint,
	[DEP_TIME] real,
	[ARR_TIME] real
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Flights.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [0419_testsynapse12_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM tableB
GO


CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = '23987hxJ#KL95234nl0zBe';
